## isValidHttpUrl() function

Validates if a URL is safe and only allows HTTP/HTTPS protocols

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isValidHttpUrl(url: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | The URL string to validate |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the URL is valid and uses HTTP/HTTPS protocol, false otherwise
